cmp: 里 (inside/internal/interior, village/within/inside, Chinese mile/neighborhood/li, a Chinese unit of length = one-half kilometer/hometown)

exm.mng: variant of 這裡|这里[zhe4 li3]
where?, somewhere, anywhere, wherever, nowhere (negative answer to question), humble expression denying compliment, also written 哪裡|哪里
there, that place, also written 那裡|那里
to look for bones in an egg, to find fault, to nitpick (idiom)
exm.pyn: jī dàn li tiāo gǔ tou
à jiā shā · kè lǐ sī dì

exm.mng: Bristol port city in southwest England
lit. itchy heart, to be itching to do sth (idiom)
Chinese roseheart radish (shinrimei radish), green on the outside, purple-red on the inside, a favorite Beijing vegetable
no ivory comes from the mouth of a dog (idiom), no good words are to be expected from a scoundrel
exm.pyn: gǒu zuǐ li tǔ bù chū xiàng yá
